overview: Toni is raising her five children alone. A full-time job. She also sings in the evening at bars. Toni has talent. She recorded a hit single. But that was 20 years ago. Today, as her two eldest children prepare to go to university, Toni wonders: what will she do when all of her offspring have left home? At 43, is there still time to take control of your life?
title: Toni, en famille
